title: Professional Seminars in Finance
description: Discussion series involving industry experts, alumni, and executives on current issues in financial services. Educates students on industry trends. Prepares students to be effective users of the financial press and to be effective in discussion and interaction with financial professionals. S/U grades only. May be taken for credit two times. Students may not earn credit for both MGTF 416 and MGT 401. Prerequisites: restricted to master of quantitative finance program or with instructor approval or department approval.
